channel.title: [317]PVP/PK point Exchange help[317]
channel.description:
** Problem Number One: ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ i need help adding a FUN pk place.. i wanna make lumby a FULL lumby pk place..?
Problem Number Two: ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯ ADDING a pvp point exchange.. I wanna make it so that when you kill a player, you get a random item, and a castlewars ticket..but, i want the castlewars ticket to be exchangeable to get a item from a PK exchange place..would this be possible and please post..all advice is accepted..
PLEASE POST!!
*~Thanks.!
~(Ass)assin.

item.title: [317]PVP/PK point Exchange help[317]
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

  1. Use a method, like isInWilderness(), and when you die, check for the funPk, and if you’re in funPk, apply a method that allows you to keep all your items when you die.

Read full topic
